author: Koimoi.Com Team
title: Badrinath Ki Dulhania's New Song Aashiq Surrender Hua | Alia & Varun Go Full On Desi!
text: tweet Here’s the brand new track Aashiq Surrender Hua from the upcoming rom-com film Badrinath Ki Dulhania . This foot tapping track showcases the masti between the lead pair – Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt, with some amazing desi moves. Watch the track right here: Enjoy The Foot-Tapping Desi Track Aashiq Surrender Hua | Ft. Alia And Varun Crooned by Amaal Mallik and Shreya Ghoshal, the track is written by Shabbir Ahmed and composed by Amaal Mallik. Directed Shashank Khaitan, the film is set to hit the screens on 10th March. TAGS
